title: It's so disturbing
selftext:
So today I was a scrolling yt and found  this it's so horrifying I always thought they r doing all this with there will but dem child trafficking is happening in our country openly and no-one is bothering
Today I saw two post on rape and then this in a single day I try to avoid these things but I realised ki sirf mere avoid krne se ye khtm to nai n ho jaega 
Why gov don't do anything fr this ? 
And  forgive me fr this but I wonder if they r demeaned by society then what about the men going there we shouldn't respect them also right? 
I m sry if this offend anyone I just wanted to share my thoughts
